name: ミンク
message: "Put your hands on the wall."
...I can guess what's coming next.

name: 蒼葉
message: "No fucking way!"
I try to knee him in the stomach.
But he blocks me easily, then punches me in the face again.
My vision cuts out briefly and the taste of blood fills my mouth.

name: ミンク
message: "Hurry up."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I said no...! ...Ngh!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ungh...!"
I throw another punch, but he catches my arm and punches me instead. He's so much stronger than me. He isn't even trying.

name: 蒼葉
message: "No! ...Agh!"
As I struggle, Mink once again grabs my hair and pulls it back. Liquid fire sears my nerves.

name: ミンク
message: "Shut up."
The punches have left my vision a blur. He flips me around as I stumble and slams my swollen cheek against the cool wall.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Urgh..."
He traps me against the wall, bringing his full weight to bear.
His smell, like cinnamon, surrounds me.
I ball my hands into fists. My jaw is clenched so hard I think it might shatter.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Why... Ngh, why are you doing this...?!"
Helpless and humiliated, I can't stop the words from coming.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I never wanted any of this―this power... I... I was happy just living a normal, boring life!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "But you saved Granny... so if you say 'jump,' I'll say 'how high?' If you tell me to get my shit together, I'll start shoveling! But―"

name: 蒼葉
message: "But... I'm lost here. I don't know what's going on! You throw all this shit at me and you expect me to just accept it?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "At least let me stumble a little... I hate this...!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm... not like you..."
By the end, I'm practically sobbing. My shoulders have begun to tremble.
Mink reaches around and grabs my chin from behind.
He forces me to turn and look into his piercing eyes.

name: ミンク
message: "It's your fate. It was decided the moment you were born. If you need someone to hate, hate the gods."

name: ミンク
message: "But you aren't the only one shouldering a burden. Everyone has their own shit to deal with. You aren't the hero of some fucking tragedy."

name: ミンク
message: "It doesn't matter if you wanted it. This is reality. It's the only one you've got."

name: ミンク
message: "So deal with it. You. Not anyone else. If you hate it so much, fight like your fucking life depends on it."

name: ミンク
message: "You're the one who decides what you do. Or are you such a worm that you can't wipe your own ass without orders?"

name: ミンク
message: "I do as I will. Your needs aren't part of it."
